<Text: Kanitkar
1:
--------------------
Text: Kanitkar:  Kanitkars, like most other Konkanastha Chitpavan Brahmins, originate in the Konkan strip on the western seacoast of India - about 300-500 kilometers south of Mumbai.
Triplets:<Kanitkar
3:
--------------------
Text: Kanitkar:  Kanitkars belong to Kaushik Gotra, and consider Shri Vyadeshwar at Guhaghar, Maharashtra, India as their primary "family god" [Kul Daivat].
Triplets:<Kanitkars
